trans-unit.source: To add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule
trans-unit.target: To add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule

trans-unit.source: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.
trans-unit.target: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.

trans-unit.source: In the tabular listing of the policies, select and click the policy that you want to edit.
trans-unit.target: In the tabular listing of the policies, select and click the policy that you want to edit.

trans-unit.source: Under **General**, you can modify the backup policy name.
trans-unit.target: Under **General**, you can modify the backup policy name.

trans-unit.source: manage schedules
trans-unit.target: manage schedules

trans-unit.source: Click **Manage Schedules**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Manage Schedules**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Manage Schedule** dialog box, under **Add or Modify a schedule**, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the **Manage Schedule** dialog box, under **Add or Modify a schedule**, do the following:

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, choose an existing schedule or select **Add** to create a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, choose an existing schedule or select **Add** to create a new schedule.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon

trans-unit.source: modify schedules 1
trans-unit.target: modify schedules 1

trans-unit.source: modify schedules 1
trans-unit.target: modify schedules 1

trans-unit.source: Select the type of backup as local or cloud snapshot.
trans-unit.target: Select the type of backup as local or cloud snapshot.

trans-unit.source: modify schedules 1
trans-unit.target: modify schedules 1

trans-unit.source: Specify the backup frequency, retention, and starting time for the schedule.
trans-unit.target: Specify the backup frequency, retention, and starting time for the schedule.

trans-unit.source: Select the check box to enable or disable the schedule.
trans-unit.target: Select the check box to enable or disable the schedule.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon

trans-unit.source: check icon
trans-unit.target: check icon

trans-unit.source: to save the schedule.
trans-unit.target: to save the schedule.

trans-unit.source: In the **Volumes** section, choose the volumes that this policy will be applied to.
trans-unit.target: In the **Volumes** section, choose the volumes that this policy will be applied to.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Save** to save the changes to this policy.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Save** to save the changes to this policy.

trans-unit.source: You will prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Click **Yes** to save the policy.
trans-unit.target: Click **Yes** to save the policy.

trans-unit.source: The **Backup Policies** page will be updated to save the changes to the policy.
trans-unit.target: The **Backup Policies** page will be updated to save the changes to the policy.
